notesStmt.note: Compound document includes transcribed cover letter and image of transaction statement.

bibl.title: Cover letter and transaction statement ending July 17, 1908, Lincoln Land Company

msIdentifier.repository: McCracken Research Library, MS407 Bronson Rumsey Collection

div1.note:
Office of Lincoln Land Company
Rooms 9 to 16, No. 140 South 13th St.
Lincoln, Neb.
C. H. Morrill, President.
A. B. Minor, Sec'y & Treasurer.
Executive Committee:
H. B. Scott. Charles E. Perkins. C. H. Morrill. A. B. Minor.
Incorporated April 1880.
Quotations of Prices Are Subject to Change without Notice.
div1.p: We enclose herewith statement of business transacted by this Company with respect to the half interest held by you as Trustee in the town of Cody. Wyoming, during the six months ending June 30, 1908, the same showing a balance of $24.90, which stands to the credit of your account. Same will be included in the next semi-annual statement.
Statement of business transacted at Cody, Wyoming, by the Lincoln Land Company, with respect to the one-half interest of Bronson Rumsey, trustee, for the six months ending June 30, 1908.
div1.note: [View image of six-month financial statement ending June 30, 1908, for full display.]
